Blog rest api

Endpoints

  • GET all posts: https://heuristic-aryabhata-f620d5.netlify.app/.netlify/functions/api/posts
  • GET post by id: https://heuristic-aryabhata-f620d5.netlify.app/.netlify/functions/api/posts/:id
  • POST post: https://heuristic-aryabhata-f620d5.netlify.app/.netlify/functions/api/posts
  • DELETE post by id: https://heuristic-aryabhata-f620d5.netlify.app/.netlify/functions/api/posts/:id
